## How to use

the different models can be interactively tested in various settings.

Not yet, though.

``` python
To use this, you might need to tunnel some ports over ssh.
ssh -L8888:localhost:8888 $GPU-SERVER
ssh -L7860:localhost:7860 $GPU-SERVER
```
